title: dhEva namOnamO
sahitya:
dEva namO namO vidyAdhirAja tE dEdIpyamAnA krtE mahApatE

anupallavi

 pAvana vigraha pApa bharApaha pAhi gurO bhakta lOka shubhAvaha

caraNam

 prajnAghana gatadvaita mahOnnata prakhyAta nAnA tapOdhanArAdhita 
vijnAna dAna vrta vishva pUjita vidyAdhana vana tulasI dalArcita
